english.segment1: Away in a manger, no crib for a bed. The little Lord Jesus lay down His sweet head. The stars in the sky look down where He lay. But little Lord Jesus asleep on the hay
english.segment2: Oh, what a sacred night, the stars were shinin' bright. The angels sing it loudly, the Savior has arrived. Their music filled the skies, oh, what a lullaby. To announce the new born baby to people far and nigh
english.segment3: And they cried glory, glory, glory, glory, glory, glory. Glory, glory, glory to the Lord God on high. All the angels sang glory, glory, glory, glory, glory, glory. Glory, glory, glory to the Lord God on high
english.segment4: The cattle are lowing, the baby awakes. But little Lord Jesus, no crying He makes. I love Thee Lord Jesus, look down from the sky. And stay by my cradle till morning is nigh
english.segment5: Oh, what a sacred night, the stars are shinin' bright. Angels sing it loudly, the Savior has arrived. Their music fill the skies, oh, what a lullaby. To announce the new born baby to people far and nigh
english.segment6: And they sing glory, glory, glory, glory, glory, glory. Glory, glory, glory to the Lord God on high. All the angels sing glory, glory, glory, glory, glory, glory. Glory, glory, glory to the Lord God on high
english.segment7: Be near me, Lord Jesus, I ask You to stay. Close by me forever and love me, I pray. Bless all the dear children in Thy tender care. And fill us for Heaven to live with You there
english.segment8: And we will cry holy, holy, holy, holy, holy, holy. Holy, holy, holy is the Lord God on high. Children, help me sing, holy, holy, holy, holy, holy, holy. Holy, holy, holy is the Lord God on high
english.segment9: Everybody sing glory, glory, glory, glory, glory, glory. Glory, glory, glory to the Lord God on high. Glory, glory, glory, glory, glory, glory. Glory, glory, glory to the Lord God on high
english.segment10: Glory, glory, glory, glory, glory, glory. Glory, glory, glory to the Lord God on high. Glory, glory, glory, glory, glory, glory. Glory, glory, glory to the Lord God on high
english.segment11: Glory, glory, glory, glory, glory, glory. Glory, glory, glory
